level.text: A licensee may surrender a license by sending to the Superintendent [Commissioner] the license and a written statement that the license is surrendered.
The surrender of a license does not affect any civil or criminal liability of a licensee for acts committed before the license was surrendered.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-155
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-155, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 26-1101.
